Class SessionValidatorAction

                          org.apache.cocoon.acting.SessionValidatorAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.cocoon.acting.Action, Configurable, Serviceable, ThreadSafe
public class SessionValidatorAction
extends org.apache.cocoon.acting.AbstractValidatorAction
implements ThreadSafe

This is the action used to validate Session parameters (attributes). The parameters are described via the external xml file.

Version:
$Id: SessionValidatorAction.java 607378 2007-12-29 05:36:16Z vgritsenko $
